1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. Scroll down to '...'
4. See error

If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

## 🧪 Expected Behavior

What did you expect to happen instead?

## 🖥 Environment

Please complete the following information:

- OS: [e.g. Windows 11, macOS Ventura, Ubuntu 22.04]
